radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple thyroid nodules up to 3.7 cm in size.
Several foci in the neck, the skull, abdomen, and right upper femur.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Last WBS in May 2005 showed marked improvement indicating only a faint activity in the thyroid bed without evidence of any other abnormal uptake in the previously described skeletal sites.

radiographic_examinations.findings: High signal intensity subtrochantric lesion of 4 cm size.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: FNA of this lesion confirmed the diagnosis of metastatic follicular thyroid cancer.
